About the Company: Everest Kanto Cylinder (EKC) is engaged in the business of manufacturing industrial and CNG cylinders. EKC has manufacturing units located atAurangabad, Tarapur and Gandhidam (India) andMiddle East.The company is engaged in manufacturing of industrial cylinders for for oxygen, hydrogen, nitrogen, argon, helium, air, etc, manufacturing of allied products such as cylinder valves, value protection guards, value protection caps, trolleys, purge bottles and industrial equipment,manufactures oxygen and nitrous oxide cylinders and manufactures CNG cylinders required in three wheelers, buses and delivery vehicles. It also manufactures beverage cylinders and accumulators.
